title: The Fixer and the Samurai - /TUNED
description: When we arrived in Panama City, all our plans completely fell apart. We had nothing, and no one. Until Joel Bolanos came along, became our fixer, and saved our trip. In this film, we take Joel's brilliant custom Suzuki Samurai up in the Cerro Azul, Panama's mountain region, for a little off roaring adventure.
